task_description: Build fully autonomous futures trading bot using Interactive Brokers Python API with ultra-aggressive capital growth focus, optimizing for rapid profitability and Sharpe ratio improvement.
files_to_reference: ib_async documentation - Connection patterns, async handling
River documentation - Online learning with predict_one/learn_one
Dash documentation - dcc.Interval for real-time updates

patterns.ib_async_connection: Use connectAsync() with unique clientId, async/await throughout
patterns.river_online_learning: Features as dict, use learn_one() NOT fit_one(), predict_one() then learn_one()

critical_constraints.no_hardcoded_values: All thresholds, strategies must be self-calibrating
critical_constraints.live_data_only: Never trade without verified live market data
critical_constraints.futures_only: No stocks, options, forex, or crypto
critical_constraints.demo_account: Running on IB demo account for experimentation
critical_constraints.confidence_gated: Only trade when confidence exceeds dynamic threshold
critical_constraints.continuous_learning: Update model after every trade, especially losses

critical_gotchas: ib_async requires NO ibapi package - implements IBKR protocol internally
ContFuture is for HISTORICAL data only - cannot use for real-time or orders
River features MUST be Python dict format, NOT numpy arrays
Use learn_one() NOT fit_one() with River
Each IB connection needs unique clientId
Market data limited to 100 lines per username

existing_implementations.description: Greenfield project - no existing code to extend
